00031 #include "BLI_math_color.h"
00032 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"

00037 /******************************** Color Space ********************************/
00038 
00039 MINLINE void srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(float linear[3], const float srgb[3])
00040 {
00041     linear[0] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[0]);
00042     linear[1] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[1]);
00043     linear[2] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[2]);
00044 }
00045 
00046 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(float srgb[3], const float linear[3])
00047 {
00048     srgb[0] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[0]);
00049     srgb[1] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[1]);
00050     srgb[2] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[2]);
00051 }
00052 
00053 MINLINE void srgb_to_linearrgb_v4(float linear[4], const float srgb[4])
00054 {
00055     srgb_to_linearrgb_v3_v3(linear, srgb);
00056     linear[3] = srgb[3];
00057 }
00058 
00059 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(float srgb[4], const float linear[4])
00060 {
00061     linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(srgb, linear);
00062     srgb[3] = linear[3];
00063 }
00064 
00065 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_uchar3(unsigned char srgb[3], const float linear[3])
00066 {
00067     float srgb_f[3];
00068 
00069     linearrgb_to_srgb_v3_v3(srgb_f, linear);
00070     F3TOCHAR3(srgb_f, srgb);
00071 }
00072 
00073 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_uchar4(unsigned char srgb[4], const float linear[4])
00074 {
00075     float srgb_f[4];
00076 
00077     linearrgb_to_srgb_v4(srgb_f, linear);
00078     F4TOCHAR4(srgb_f, srgb);
00079 }
00080 
00081 /* predivide versions to work on associated/pre-multipled alpha. if this should
00082  * be done or not depends on the background the image will be composited over,
00083  * ideally you would never do color space conversion on an image with alpha
00084  * because it is ill defined */
00085 
00086 MINLINE void srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(float linear[4], const float srgb[4])
00087 {
00088     float alpha, inv_alpha;
00089 
00090     if (srgb[3] == 1.0f || srgb[3] == 0.0f) {
00091         alpha = 1.0f;
00092         inv_alpha = 1.0f;
00093     }
00094     else {
00095         alpha = srgb[3];
00096         inv_alpha = 1.0f / alpha;
00097     }
00098 
00099     linear[0] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[0] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00100     linear[1] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[1] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00101     linear[2] = srgb_to_linearrgb(srgb[2] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00102     linear[3] = srgb[3];
00103 }
00104 
00105 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_predivide_v4(float srgb[4], const float linear[4])
00106 {
00107     float alpha, inv_alpha;
00108 
00109     if (linear[3] == 1.0f || linear[3] == 0.0f) {
00110         alpha = 1.0f;
00111         inv_alpha = 1.0f;
00112     }
00113     else {
00114         alpha = linear[3];
00115         inv_alpha = 1.0f / alpha;
00116     }
00117 
00118     srgb[0] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[0] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00119     srgb[1] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[1] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00120     srgb[2] = linearrgb_to_srgb(linear[2] * inv_alpha) * alpha;
00121     srgb[3] = linear[3];
00122 }
00123 
00124 /* LUT accelerated conversions */
00125 
00126 extern float BLI_color_from_srgb_table[256];
00127 extern unsigned short BLI_color_to_srgb_table[0x10000];
00128 
00129 MINLINE unsigned short to_srgb_table_lookup(const float f)
00130 {
00131 
00132     union {
00133         float f;
00134         unsigned short us[2];
00135     } tmp;
00136     tmp.f = f;
00137 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00138     return BLI_color_to_srgb_table[tmp.us[0]];
00139 #else
00140     return BLI_color_to_srgb_table[tmp.us[1]];
00141 #endif
00142 }
00143 
00144 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4(unsigned short srgb[4], const float linear[4])
00145 {
00146     srgb[0] = to_srgb_table_lookup(linear[0]);
00147     srgb[1] = to_srgb_table_lookup(linear[1]);
00148     srgb[2] = to_srgb_table_lookup(linear[2]);
00149     srgb[3] = FTOUSHORT(linear[3]);
00150 }
00151 
00152 MINLINE void linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4_predivide(unsigned short srgb[4], const float linear[4])
00153 {
00154     float alpha, inv_alpha, t;
00155     int i;
00156 
00157     if (linear[3] == 1.0f || linear[3] == 0.0f) {
00158         linearrgb_to_srgb_ushort4(srgb, linear);
00159         return;
00160     }
00161 
00162     alpha = linear[3];
00163     inv_alpha = 1.0f / alpha;
00164 
00165     for (i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00166         t = linear[i] * inv_alpha;
00167         srgb[i] = (t < 1.0f) ? (unsigned short) (to_srgb_table_lookup(t) * alpha) : FTOUSHORT(linearrgb_to_srgb(t) * alpha);
00168     }
00169 
00170     srgb[3] = FTOUSHORT(linear[3]);
00171 }
00172 
00173 MINLINE void srgb_to_linearrgb_uchar4(float linear[4], const unsigned char srgb[4])
00174 {
00175     linear[0] = BLI_color_from_srgb_table[srgb[0]];
00176     linear[1] = BLI_color_from_srgb_table[srgb[1]];
00177     linear[2] = BLI_color_from_srgb_table[srgb[2]];
00178     linear[3] = srgb[3] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
00179 }
00180 
00181 MINLINE void srgb_to_linearrgb_uchar4_predivide(float linear[4], const unsigned char srgb[4])
00182 {
00183     float fsrgb[4];
00184     int i;
00185 
00186     if (srgb[3] == 255 || srgb[3] == 0) {
00187         srgb_to_linearrgb_uchar4(linear, srgb);
00188         return;
00189     }
00190 
00191     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00192         fsrgb[i] = srgb[i] * (1.0f / 255.0f);
00193 
00194     srgb_to_linearrgb_predivide_v4(linear, fsrgb);
00195 }
00196 
00197 /* color macros for themes */
00198 #define rgba_char_args_set_fl(col, r, g, b, a)  rgba_char_args_set(col, r * 255, g * 255, b * 255, a * 255)
00199 
00200 MINLINE void rgba_char_args_set(char col[4], const char r, const char g, const char b, const char a)
00201 {
00202     col[0] = r;
00203     col[1] = g;
00204     col[2] = b;
00205     col[3] = a;
00206 }
00207 
00208 MINLINE void rgba_char_args_test_set(char col[4], const char r, const char g, const char b, const char a)
00209 {
00210     if (col[3] == 0) {
00211         col[0] = r;
00212         col[1] = g;
00213         col[2] = b;
00214         col[3] = a;
00215     }
00216 }
